sourcesContent:
<script>
import axios from 'axios';

export default {
  data() {
    return {
      event: {
        name: '',
        description: '',
        date: ''
      },
      successMessage: '',
      errorMessage: ''
    };
  },
  methods: {
    createEvent() {
      axios.post('http://localhost:3000/api/events', this.event)
        .then(() => {  // Removed 'response' as it is unused
          this.successMessage = 'Event created successfully!';
          this.errorMessage = ''; // Clear any previous errors
          this.event = { name: '', description: '', date: '' }; // Reset form
        })
        .catch(() => {  // Removed 'error' as it is unused
          this.errorMessage = 'Failed to create event!';
          this.successMessage = ''; // Clear success message
        });
    }
  }
};
</script>
